author: amaltaro
body:
Following these 2 deployment pull requests:
https://github.com/dmwm/deployment/pull/834
https://github.com/dmwm/deployment/pull/832

remove any reference and/or spec file for the following services:
* bigcouch
* stagemanager and stagemanager-agent
* crabhb
* mechanize
title: Remove spec files for bigcouch/crabhb/mechanize/stagemanager
